graph.original_query: Create a professional one-page (index.html) dark-themed (Black and White only) portfolio website for a Software Hacker using Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css (for scroll-in section reveals and CTA hover transitions), and Splide.js (for a testimonial carousel and horizontally scrolling image gallery); use CDN only (no build tools); apply a sleek black/charcoal base, warm beige/muted orange accents, elegant typography, refined spacing, subtle transitions (no glows/neons); include sticky header with anchor links, hero section with fullscreen image (https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1), category highlight cards (https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale/random=1), animated counters (clients, projects, years), About (mission, timeline), Gallery or Services grid (6–8 projects), Contact form (name/email/message), and footer with social icons; keep layout responsive and professional, with no lorem ipsum, real readable text, and pure HTML/CSS/JS; Use CoderAgent in 9–10 precise updates (meta, header, hero, counters, cards, timeline, gallery, testimonial slider, contact form, layout cleanup), and finally audit spacing, contrast, and visual balance to ensure premium Software Hacker look. Ask the CoderAgent to update the same index.html, use code to update it if file is longer and make sure old content is not deleted, and only required sections are updated. Remind CoderAgent to update the placeholders (not overwrite whole file)

T001.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to create the basic HTML structure for a one-page portfolio website. I will include meta tags, title, and CDN links for Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js. I will also add placeholders for the different sections of the website. Finally, I will add inline CSS to apply a dark theme.

nodes.description: Create the basic HTML structure, including meta tags, title, and CDN links for Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js. Add placeholders for header, hero section, counters, category cards, about section, gallery, testimonial slider, contact form, and footer. Add basic CSS for dark theme (Black and White only) with black/charcoal base, warm beige/muted orange accents, elegant typography, refined spacing, and subtle transitions
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the basic HTML structure for a one-page portfolio website. Include meta tags, title (Software Hacker Portfolio), and CDN links for Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js. Add placeholders using HTML comments for the following sections: <!-- HEADER_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- HERO_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- COUNTERS_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- CARDS_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- ABOUT_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- GALLERY_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- TESTIMONIALS_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- CONTACT_PLACEHOLDER -->, and <!-- FOOTER_PLACEHOLDER -->. Apply a dark theme (Black and White only) using basic CSS, with a black/charcoal base, warm beige/muted orange accents, elegant typography, refined spacing, and subtle transitions. Make sure to set up the basic container structure for the content. Ensure the CSS is inline and not in a separate file.

output.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to create the basic HTML structure for a one-page portfolio website. I will include meta tags, title, and CDN links for Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js. I will also add placeholders for the different sections of the website. Finally, I will add inline CSS to apply a dark theme.

nodes.description: Implement the sticky header with anchor links to different sections of the page. Include the website logo and navigation links to Hero, About, Gallery/Services, and Contact sections. Ensure responsiveness across different screen sizes.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by implementing the sticky header section within the `<!-- HEADER_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. The header should include a website logo (placeholder text is fine) and navigation links to Hero, About, Gallery/Services, and Contact sections. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and Flowbite for interactivity if needed. Ensure the header is sticky and responsive. Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Create the Hero section with a full-screen image (using https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1), a headline, and a brief introduction about the Software Hacker. Include a call-to-action button with a hover transition effect using Animate.css.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by creating the Hero section within the `<!-- HERO_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Use a full-screen image from https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1. Add a compelling headline and a brief introduction about the Software Hacker. Include a call-to-action button (e.g., 'Contact Me') with a subtle hover transition effect using Animate.css. Ensure the section is responsive and visually appealing with the specified dark theme. Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Implement animated counters for Clients, Projects, and Years of experience. Use JavaScript to animate the counters on page load. Apply appropriate styling to match the dark theme.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by implementing animated counters within the `<!-- COUNTERS_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Create counters for Clients, Projects, and Years of experience. Use JavaScript to animate the counters on page load. Apply appropriate styling using Tailwind CSS to match the dark theme.  Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Design and integrate category highlight cards (using https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale/random=1) to showcase the hacker's expertise in different areas such as web development, cybersecurity, and reverse engineering. Ensure each card has a title, brief description, and a link to related projects. Ensure good contrast for readability.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by designing and integrating category highlight cards within the `<!-- CARDS_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Use images from https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale/random=1 for each card. Showcase the hacker's expertise in areas such as web development, cybersecurity, and reverse engineering. Each card should include a title, a brief description, and a link to related projects. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and ensure good contrast for readability.  Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Create the About section with a brief mission statement and a timeline highlighting key milestones in the hacker's career. Use CSS to style the timeline with a clean and professional look. Ensure text contrast and readability.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by creating the About section within the `<!-- ABOUT_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Include a brief mission statement and a timeline highlighting key milestones in the hacker's career. Use CSS (Tailwind CSS) to style the timeline with a clean and professional look. Ensure proper text contrast and readability.  Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Implement a Gallery or Services grid with 6–8 projects, showcasing the hacker's best work. Use images and descriptions for each project. Ensure the grid is responsive and visually appealing.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by implementing a Gallery or Services grid within the `<!-- GALLERY_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Showcase 6–8 projects, using images and descriptions for each project. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and ensure the grid is responsive and visually appealing.  Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Integrate a testimonial carousel using Splide.js to display client testimonials. Style the carousel to match the dark theme and ensure it is functional and responsive.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by integrating a testimonial carousel within the `<!-- TESTIMONIALS_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Use Splide.js to display client testimonials. Style the carousel to match the dark theme and ensure it is functional and responsive. Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Create a Contact form with fields for name, email, and message. Implement basic form validation using HTML5 attributes and style the form to match the dark theme.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by creating a Contact form within the `<!-- CONTACT_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Include fields for name, email, and message. Implement basic form validation using HTML5 attributes and style the form to match the dark theme using Tailwind CSS. Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Design the footer section with social icons (using Font Awesome or similar) and a copyright notice. Style the footer to match the dark theme and ensure it is responsive.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by designing the footer section within the `<!-- FOOTER_PLACEHOLDER -->` section. Include social icons (using Font Awesome or similar) and a copyright notice. Style the footer to match the dark theme using Tailwind CSS and ensure it is responsive. Remember to only update the content within the specified placeholder.

nodes.description: Perform a final audit of spacing, contrast, and visual balance across all sections of the one-page portfolio website, and ensure the premium Software Hacker look as requested is complete.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the `index.html` file (passed as input) by performing a final audit of spacing, contrast, and visual balance across all sections of the one-page portfolio website. Make any necessary adjustments to ensure a polished and professional design, in accordance with the provided prompt and desired aesthetics of being a 'premium Software Hacker look'. Remember to use Tailwind CSS for styling and only update the content within the specified placeholders.

nodes.description: Format the final HTML output for readability and structure.
nodes.agent_prompt: Beautify the final HTML code in `index.html` (passed as input) for enhanced readability and a well-structured presentation. Ensure the HTML follows best practices and is properly indented. Pay attention to the dark theme and make sure code is well-organized.

nodes.description: Summarize the final output HTML file using distilled text and key sections, including code blocks, CSS, JS, etc.
nodes.agent_prompt: Analyze the final `index.html` file (passed as input) and create a distilled summary including key sections (header, hero, about, gallery, testimonial, contact, footer), tech (Tailwind, Flowbite, Animate.css, Splide.js), CSS (dark-themed, fonts, animations, layout) and JS functions.
